locations.name: Burlington
locations.description: Food pantry services provided by Freedom Fellowship Church

locations.name: Charlotte
locations.org: Nourish UP @ Care Ring - Referral Required
locations.description:
Previously "Loaves & Fishes/Friendship Trays". New name. Same mission.

This is an emergency food pantry that requires a referral. 

**How To Get A Referral:**
To get a referral please have the following information ready for each person in the household:
• First and Last Name
• Date of Birth
• Phone Number (if available)
• Current Address
• Gender
• Ethnicity
• Veteran Status (Y or N)
• Receiving Food Stamps/SNAP (Y or N)
• Household Income**
• Disability (Y or N)
• Email Address (if available)
• Date of Pick Up
• Preferred Pantry Location and secondary location in case the primary location is at capacity.

To access pop-up food shares for excess fresh items, no referral, ID or financial documents are required. Pre-registration is required to ensure there is enough food. Follow this link to see locations and register:  https://nourishup.org/foodshare/

Visit our website at https://nourishup.org/pantries/ under the food pantries tab for all of our location and hours.

locations.name: Charlotte
locations.description:
Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit" https://northcarolina.summerebtapp.com/begin
Go to https://apply.mrelief.com/screener or text "Food" to 74544 to check eligibility.

locations.name: Concord
locations.address: 587 Old Charlotte Road Southwest, Concord, NC 28027
locations.description:
Solo Faith Food Bank – Free Groceries in Concord NC

If you're looking for compassionate, convenient, and consistent access to free food in Concord NC, the Solo Faith Food Bank is here to serve. Operated by Solo Faith Church, this volunteer-run food outreach program offers grocery relief to individuals and families in need across Cabarrus County.

locations.name: Cotswold
locations.description:
From 06-16-2025 to 06-26-2025. 
The supervisor is Tonya Haygood  (tel: (980) 343-5520).  
All kids and teens ages 18 and under can eat for free.
Some meal sites may ask for registration to receive meals
Families can receive $120 in SUN Bucks grocery-buying benefits per eligible school-aged child on a debit-like card to buy nutritious food during the summer at grocery stores, farmers markets and some online retailers. Learn more and find out if your child is eligible at ncdhhs.gov/SUNBucks.

locations.name: Huntersville
locations.address: 510 North Old Statesville Road, Huntersville, NC 28078
locations.description:
* Free seated meal each weekday.
* No qualification required.  
* Note:  *visitors who arrive between 12:40-1:00 p.m. will receive a to-go meal.*
* After eating lunch, visitors can take home groceries from our Marketplace (subject to availability). **Walk-up grocery shopping is not provided.
* We share a driveway with New Friendship Presbyterian Church at the intersection of Ramah Church Road & Old Statesville Road.  For reference, the church is located across the street from a 7-Eleven gas station.
